short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends current Google Maps window location to BoM IFD and AR&R Data Hub webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a hydrologist in Australia, then no doubt you've typed your fair share of coordinates into Bureau and AR&R websites to obtain your data. 

No one likes doing that.

This extension takes the coordinates from a Google Maps window that you are viewing, and uses them to open the Bureau of Meteorology IFD webpage, and also loads the relevant Australian Rainfall and Runoff data.

Usage: The extension icon will only be active on Google Maps web pages. If you click it, it will open a window for the BoM IFD site and one AR&R site, using the currently viewed Maps location.
